name: Numbers remember puzzle
description:
Kid game with brain practice. Brain teasers board game for your kids. Mind the number position and tap on it sequence manner only after it closed. There will be one number increase after each round. Better to give this application to your child rather than Youtube videos.

RULES
- Keep remember number position and tap on it sequently after
- Its nock round and it always starts the game from first.
- Default game will start with a minimum 4 numbers.
- In the new level, you will 1 to 5 numbers, then 1 to 6 numbers and so on.
- The score also calculates and stored. Check high score on the settings page.

LEVELS
- Normal
- Tough
- Toughest

TRAINING
- Take training for a different number of tiles sequence by updating its settings.
- Tiles up to 8 which start from 4.

Feel free to contact us on mayihelpu4app@gmail.com if you have any query.
